metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10936 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: A weakness was found in postgresql-jdbc before version 42.2.5. It waspossible to provide an SSL Factory and not check the host name if a hostname verifier was not provided to the driver. This could lead to acondition where a man-in-the-middle attacker could masquerade as a trustedserver by providing a certificate for the wrong host, as long as it wassigned by a trusted CA.

criterions.comment: libpgjava package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
